name: Gale Wings
summary: Increases the priority of Flying moves by one. Attacking Flying moves can then be blocked by Quick Guard. Hidden Power Flying does not get this priority increase.
viability: Gale Wings is the entire reason Talonflame is one of the best revenge killers. Given Talonflame's great Speed and decent Attack, Gale Wings Brave Bird is a nightmare to deal with if not resisted. Strap a Choice Band on Talonflame and you have a terrifying threat.
